FuncDef: The display mpls label-stack vpls vsi command displays information about label stacks in VPLS networking.
CLIs: display mpls label-stack vpls vsi <vsi-name> peer <peer-id> vc-id <vc-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VSI.
The VSI name specified here must be consistent with that specified in the vsi command.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the peer IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the VC ID, which uniquely identifies a VC.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls label-stack vpls vsi vsi1 peer 3.3.3.3 vc 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check label stack information after configuring LDP VPLS, run the display mpls label-stack vpls vsi command. Label stack information helps you view VPLS PW forwarding information.
Precautions
This command displays only information about label stacks supporting LDP VPLS.
